title: 02/01/22 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 02/01/22 DPS Best Of
description:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, DP talks to NFL Network's Tom Pelissero about QB Hand sizes. With NFL Draft prospect Kenny Pickett deciding to not get his hand measured at the Senior Bowl, how important is the measurement to teams? Nick Wright calls in to work out his differences with DP. Sam Webb, publisher of TheMichiganInsider.com, explains why he sees Jim Harbaugh leaving Ann Arbor if offered the Vikings job. And LA Time columnist Bill Plaschke discusses the importance of the Super Bowl to LA.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
